data.comment: The match has been interrupted.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 2, Oscar Macias Romo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno has run offside.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Pachuca's Victor Davila gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Erick Aguirre for Pachuca drives towards goal at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 14, Pachuca's Gustavo Cabral is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 16, Oscar Macias Romo signals a Pachuca throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Juan Vigon.
In the minute 23, That's a fine assist from Favio Alvarez.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Pumas UNAM have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 31, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Attention is being given to Pumas UNAMâ€™s Favio Alvarez and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 34, An attacking Pachuca player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Favio Alvarez for Pumas UNAM is back on the field again.
A massive blow for Pachuca as Victor Davila misses from the spot.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 38, Roberto de la Rosa (Pachuca) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Gustavo Cabral (Pachuca) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Andres Iniestra gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 42, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo awards the away team a throw-in.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Oscar Macias Romo awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oscar Macias Romo will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
The first-half is over at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Erick Aguirre levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Alfredo Talavera is back on the pitch.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Pachuca de Soto to check on Alfredo Talavera, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 49, Roberto de la Rosa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Roberto de la Rosa is back on his feet again.
In the minute 56, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Can Pachuca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 58, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 59, Oscar Macias Romo awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca.
The match at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Victor Guzman, who is down injured.
In the minute 61, Facundo Waller for Pumas UNAM has been booked by Oscar Macias Romo and receives a first yellow card.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pachuca's Victor Guzman is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 68, Pachuca's Kevin Alvarez has been booked in Pachuca de Soto.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Roberto de la Rosa's finish is wide of the goal.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a first substitution, with Cristian Souza replacing Erick Sanchez.
In the minute 70, Pachuca make their second substitution with Antonio Figueroa replacing Roberto de la Rosa.
The away team have replaced Facundo Waller with Juan Iturbe. This is the first substitution made today by Andres Lillini.
In the minute 70, Carlos Gutierrez is on a sub for Juan Dinenno for Pumas UNAM.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 74, Oscar Macias Romo awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gonzalez misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 78, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 80, Alan Mozo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Felipe Pardo is replacing Victor Davila for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 84, In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca drive forward through Cristian Souza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Luis Chavez (Pachuca) has received a yellow card from Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 86, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Alfredo Talavera has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Can Pachuca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 89, Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Oscar Macias Romo blows against Pachuca's Erick Aguirre for offside.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 9 minutes of added time.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Pachuca throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Paulo Pezzolano is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Leonardo Ramos replacing Victor Sosa.
The away team replace Andres Iniestra with Erik Lira.
